long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lightweight Reader View: Enhance Your Reading Experience Effortlessly

This extension simplifies web pages by removing distractions like ads, pop-ups, and sidebars, allowing you to focus on the content. It transforms cluttered websites into clean, easy-to-read formats, making long articles and blog posts more enjoyable and effective to navigate.

With Lightweight Reader View, you’ll experience:

	•	A distraction-free reading environment
	•	Optimized text layout for improved readability
	•	User-friendly UI for easily pinning websites for continuous reading
	•	Smart launch of reader view when appropriate for the content
	•	Seamless suspension of reader view on pinned sites for flexible browsing

Perfect for anyone who wants to read web content smoothly and efficiently!
